page.title: 07Recreation
page.content: Sports: In Newport a new sports centre is being built to replace an older one which fell down. This centre provides facilities for a wide range of indoor and outdoor sports. In addition there is a tennis club in Wormit which has three all weather courts and where tennis coaching and tournaments are held for adults and children. There is also a bowling club and a boating club. The latter provides coaching in sailing and regattas are held every year.* There is a lot of provision for gymnastics in the area. The youth club in Newport, and Wormit School are the venues for this activity for children of all ages and abilities. Wormit School also provides a place for yoga and keep fit. * In summer the club holds football matches on the sandbanks in the Tay.
